The Global Compact Network in Indonesia

A Global Compact local network was launched in Jakarta, Indonesia on 28 February 2004 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the Employersâ€™ Association of Indonesia (APINDO). Press Release

The UN Global Compact network in Indonesia was re-launched at a special ceremony held on the 8 April 2006 in the Jakarta Convention Centre as part of the Asia-Pacific Business Forum 2006. The re-launch was organised under the guidance of Martha Tilaar Group and the Indonesian Marketing Association. The new network will be supported by UNDP.
